element.short: Logical URI to reference this test script (globally unique)
element.definition: An absolute URI that is used to identify this test script when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance. This SHALL be a URL, SHOULD be globally unique, and SHOULD be an address at which this test script is (or will be) published. The URL SHOULD include the major version of the test script. For more information see [Technical and Business Versions](resource.html#versions).
element.comment: Can be a urn:uuid: or a urn:oid:, but real http: addresses are preferred.  Multiple instances may share the same url if they have a distinct version.
element.requirements: Allows the test script to be referenced by a single globally unique identifier.
